description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller that provides basic endpoints for the event management backend, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic API endpoints for the event management backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
